Example Java Project

  1. Download the example java project or browse the source here
  2. Run FitNesse as a wiki server using:
    mvn clean verify -P wiki
  3. Visit http://localhost:9123/JavaExample and explore!
  1. Run FitNesse as automated integration tests using:
    mvn clean verify -P auto
  2. The JUnit XML results can be found at target/fitnesse/results
  3. The FitNesse HTML reports can be found at target/fitnesse/reports

  • Note that the FitNesse tests in this project have also been tagged with the tags address, division and decision. Example usage of these tags is commented out in the pom.xml, and is documented here.

  • Thanks to Anubhava Srivastava for his Fit Fixture fitnesse.fit.anubhava.GenericFixture and ancillary classes, also included in the project.
